page.title: Aperion Audio Aris Wireless Card for Windows (Slotius)

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aperion Audio |model=Aris Wireless Card for Windows |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/19/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf=AWOX |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type= |fcc_id=A7K-SLOTIUS |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Aperion AP2 |default_ssid_regex=^Aperion AP2$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:1B:A0 |oui_eth=00:1B:A0 |default_ch= }} The device is presumed to have a 00:1B:A0 OUI.
Per the FCC manual, the default SSID for this device is '''Aperion AP2'''.
